Interface PatientRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Patient,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Patient,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Patient,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Patient,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Patient,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Patient>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Patient,Long>
public interface PatientRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Patient,Long>
Repository for Patient registration and search operations.

  • Method Details

    • existsByMrn

      boolean existsByMrn(String mrn)
      Checks whether an MRN already exists.
      Parameters:
      mrn - medical record number
      Returns:
      true if the MRN exists

    • findByMrn

      Optional<Patient> findByMrn(String mrn)
      Finds a patient by MRN.
      Parameters:
      mrn - medical record number
      Returns:
      matching patient, if present

    • existsByCnic

      boolean existsByCnic(String cnic)
      Checks whether a CNIC already exists.

      cnic - national ID / CNIC
      Returns:
      true if the CNIC exists

    • searchPatients

      @Query("SELECT p FROM Patient p WHERE LOWER(p.fullName) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', :query, '%')) OR p.mobileNumber LIKE CONCAT('%', :query, '%') OR LOWER(p.mrn) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', :query, '%'))") List<Patient> searchPatients(String query)
      Searches patients by name, mobile number, or MRN using a case-insensitive contains match.
      Parameters:
      query - free-text search input
      Returns:
      matching patients
